---
title: "Tracking temperature experienced by a group"
date: "2012-10-19"
author: "Fulton, Beth (Environment, Hobart)"
---

A new parameter has been added to run.prm to allow for tracking of the average temperature experienced by the group and resulting temeprarure based corrections made to their rate parameters

flag_avgTcorr_output 1    # 1 = want avg Tcorr output, 0 = 0ff
  
flag_avgTcorr_output 1    # 1 = want avg Tcorr output, 0 = 0ff
